ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. François M. Angers ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. FRANÇOIS M. ANGERS, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective October 31, 2013.
